activities: PunchTab provides a cloud-based omni-channel rewards platform for other corporations. PunchTab enables its clients to reward its customers earn points for social and other actions. In respect to receiving personal information from the EU/EEA and/or Switzerland, such organization's data will be uploaded on PunchTab’s secure servers for that purpose.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: PunchTab collects customer data  which is not manually processed.
